}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleparaIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{paraI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleparaI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash   \ottnt{A}  \odot  \ottnt{B}  }{%
{\ottdruleparaIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleparaEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{paraE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleparaE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash   \ottnt{A}  \odot  \ottnt{B}    \quad   \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{B}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{3}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{C}  }%
}{
 \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{3}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{C} }{%
{\ottdruleparaEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleseqIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{seqI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleseqI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{

{\ottdruleseqIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleseqEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{seqE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleseqE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  \rhd  \ottnt{B}   \quad   \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{B}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{3}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{C}  }%
}{
 \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{3}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{C} }{%
{\ottdruleseqEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleexName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ex}}

}{
 \Delta ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{B}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{C} }{%

\newcommand{\ottdruleimpIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{impI}}

 \Delta ; \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  \multimap  \ottnt{B} }{%

}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleimpEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{impE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleimpE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

}{
 \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleimpEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulecompName}[0]{\ottdrulename{comp}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulecomp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  \multimap  \ottnt{B}   \quad   \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{B}  \multimap  \ottnt{C}  }%

{\ottdrulecompName}{}%
}}
